name: Mayday (itch) (Scayze, FlamingFossa)
description:
Mayday, mayday! We've lost an engine!

Use [W] or [UP] to slow your decent.

Mayday is a game made in 48 hours for GMTK Jam 2018.

Made by Scayze and FlamingFossa.

(Apparently Mayday does not work for some people, so here's a windows download page: https://gamejolt.com/games/Mayday/365551 )
